EXPERIMENT.center_name: Gwangju Institute of Science and Technology
EXPERIMENT.TITLE: MinION single-end Sequencing of Ouro-Cell-Enrich-applied (targeting 65 granulocytes and cardiomyocytes among 6,964 cells in total) single-cell cDNA library of mHeart, size selected with BluePippinUpTo2250bpCut (KAE24065154)

LIBRARY_DESCRIPTOR.LIBRARY_CONSTRUCTION_PROTOCOL: The Nanopore sequencing library was prepared from a Ouro-Cell-Enrich-applied single-cell cDNA library using the Ligation Sequencing Kit V9 (#SQK-LSK109, #EXP-NBD104, and #EXP-NBD114, Oxford Nanopore Technologies) following the manufactureru0026#39;s protocol. The sequencing library was then loaded to a MinION flow cell (R9.4.1) (#FLO-MIN106, Oxford Nanopore Technologies) and sequenced on the MinION Mk1B (Oxford Nanopore Technologies) with a sampling rate of 4 kHz. The raw sequencing output (FAST5) was basecalled with Guppy (version 6.5.7) using the u0026quot;SUPu0026quot; basecalling model (the most accurate and slowest) u0026quot;dna_r9.4.1_450bps_sup.cfgu0026quot;. The low-quality reads were filtered using the minimum quality score of 9.
